MS MCQs

    SAP HANA on Azure Compute, Network, and Storage

    »

    1. What is available to calculate memory requirements for your implementation of SAP software on top of HANA?

      SAP Quick Sizer

      Azure Pricing Calculator

      Azure DTU Calculator


    2. According to the Tailored Datacenter Integration (TDI) recommendation for SAPA HANA Large Instances, you can add storage to existing instances in what size units?

      1-TB

      2-TB

      5-TB


    3. Complete the following sentence. The SAP workload on Azure storage layout is implemented according to “_____”

      “the recommendation of the Tailored Datacenter Integration (TDI) specifications for SAP HANA.”

      “Azure Data Lake Storage service parameters.”

      “Azure Storage account scale limits.”
